meanings.definition: A basketball player who can play both guard and forward positions.
meanings.sent1: The coach put in the swingmen to add versatility to the team.
meanings.sent2: The swingmen on the court seamlessly transitioned between guarding and scoring.
meanings.sent3: The swingmen decided to swap jerseys mid-game, causing confusion among the fans.
meanings.sent4: In the game of basketball, the swingmen are the chameleons of the court, adapting to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The swingmen's ability to switch positions effortlessly made them invaluable players.
